This is a pro-bono volunteer position.JerseySTEM is looking for talented professionals across our departments to commit time and energy as long-term engagement for our mission to provide STEM education to underrepresented middle school girls.The Data Analytics Head is responsible for coordinating the research, collection and organization of information related to schools, colleges or corporations, stored in spreadsheets and databases. (The Deputy Head supports and collaborates with the Data Analytics Head.)Manage a team of 2-10 analytics volunteers and interns who work on independent workstreams and/or tasksUnderstand stakeholder requirements and design projects/workstreams/tasks to deliver on the sameEstablish departmental guidelines, processes and documentation.Recruit, onboard and train new volunteers and interns. Mentor and guide - establish goals/targets for them and monitor performance.Coordinate weekly department meetingsParticipate to steering committee, board meeting and board committees as appropriateGenuine concern about/interest in solving the gender gap and opportunity gap in education in general and STEM education in particularBachelors/Masters degree in a quantitative field8+ years work experience preferredExperience with different methods and toolsets (SQL, Python, Excel, Tableau)Experience analyzing data from 3rd party providers and open data sources Google Analytics, DoE, CensusTeam management, training and mentorship experienceResourceful, lead by exampleCan-do attitude, ability to deal with ambiguityAbility to communicate technical concepts to a non-technical audiencePresent/work within East Coast time zoneAverage of 5-7 hours/week, 12 month minimum commitmentThis is a pro-bono volunteer position.
